charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_1101_0100_2:
One day, [Name:PlayerNickname ] felt a
strange presence in the forest.
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_0302_1000_1: What are you doing in the forest?
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_1101_1200_2:
The Red [Name:PlayerNickname ] knew
hardly spoke, so surely it was him.
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_1101_1300_2: But something about him felt different.
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_1101_1400_2:
Red seemed a little perplexed that someone
was speaking to him.
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_1101_1600_2:
It was obvious his bond with Red
was strong.
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_1101_1700_2:
Come to think of it, Red and Pikachu had
already forged many legends of their own,
even here on Pasio.
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_1101_1800_2:
Apparently, they first met in Viridian Forest,
in Kanto.
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_1101_1900_2: Was the same true for this Red and Pikachu?
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_0301_2000_1: Where did you first meet Pikachu?
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_0401_2100_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] asked Red
whether he met Pikachu in Viridian Forest.
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_0302_2300_1: You two look like longtime friends!
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_0402_2400_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] asked Red
whether he journeyed across Kanto with
Pikachu.
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_1101_2800_2: The question seemed to interest Red.
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_1101_2900_2:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] felt an
electrifying surge of fighting spirit from
Red and Pikachu!
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_0401_3200_2:
Pikachu and [Name:PlayerNickname ] had
the same thought.
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_0401_3300_2: Losing this battle wasn’t an option!
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_0302_3400_1: So you want to battle, huh?
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_0402_3500_2:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] asked
Pikachu, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] own thoughts clicked into place!
charaepi_ch0365_00_red2/2301_0402_3600_2: Red and Pikachu were perfect opponents!
